name.es: Escritura rápida de Documentos de Google
name.fil: Mabilis na Pagsulat ng Google Docs
name.ja: Google ドキュメントのクイック ライティング
name.sw: Hati za Google za Kuandika Haraka
name.th: Google เอกสารเขียนอย่างรวดเร็ว
name.vi: Viết nhanh trên Google Tài liệu

short.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: This Chrome extension helps you to open new Google Docs, Sheets, Keep notes, Slides, Forms, Meetings, Emails with a single click.
short.bn: এই ক্রোম এক্সটেনশনটি আপনাকে এক ক্লিকে নতুন Google ডক্স, শীট, নোট, স্লাইড, ফর্ম, মিটিং, ইমেল খুলতে সাহায্য করে।
short.de: Mit dieser Chrome-Erweiterung können Sie neue Google-Dokumente, Tabellen, Notizen, Folien, Formulare, mit einem Klick öffnen.
short.es: Esta extensión Chrome le ayuda a abrir nuevos documentos, hojas de cálculo, notas de Keep, electrónicos de Google con un solo clic.
short.fa: این برنامه افزودنی کروم به شما کمک می کند تا با یک کلیک Google Docs، Sheets، Keep Notes، Slides، Forms، ایمیل های جدید را باز کنید.
short.fil: Tinutulungan ka ng extension ng Chrome na ito na magbukas ng bagong Google Docs, Sheets, Keep notes, Emails sa isang click lang.
short.fr: Cette extension Chrome vous aide à ouvrir de nouveaux Google Docs, Sheets, Keep notes, Slides, Forms, Emails en un seul clic.
short.gu: આ ક્રોમ એક્સટેન્શન તમને એક જ ક્લિકથી નવા Google ડૉક્સ, શીટ્સ, Keep નોટ્સ, સ્લાઇડ્સ, ફોર્મ્સ, મીટિંગ્સ, ઇમેઇલ્સ ખોલવામાં મદદ કરે છે.
short.hi: यह क्रोम एक्सटेंशन आपको एक क्लिक से नए Google डॉक्स, शीट्स, कीप नोट्स, स्लाइड्स, फॉर्म, मीटिंग्स, ईमेल खोलने में मदद करता है।
short.id: Ekstensi Chrome ini membantu Anda membuka Google Dokumen, Spreadsheet, Catatan, Slide, Formulir, Rapat, Email baru dengan satu klik.
short.it: Questa estensione di Chrome ti aiuta ad aprire nuovi documenti, fogli, note di Keep, riunioni ed e-mail Google con un solo clic.
short.ja: この Chrome 拡張機能を使用すると、ワンクリックで新しい Google ドキュメント、スプレッドシート、Keep メモ、スライド、フォーム、会議、メールを開くことができます。
short.kn: ಒಂದೇ ಕ್ಲಿಕ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊಸ Google ಡಾಕ್ಸ್, ಶೀಟ್‌ಗಳು, ಕೀಪ್ ನೋಟ್ಸ್, ಸ್ಲೈಡ್‌ಗಳು, ಫಾರ್ಮ್‌ಗಳು, ತೆರೆಯಲು Chrome ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯು ನಿಮಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ
short.ko: 이 Chrome 확장 프로그램을 사용하면 한 번의 클릭으로 새로운 Google Docs, Sheets, Keep 메모, Slides, Forms, Meetings, 이메일을 열 수 있습니다.
short.mr: हे क्रोम एक्स्टेंशन तुम्हाला नवीन Google Docs, Sheets, Keep Notes, Slides, Forms, Meetings, Emails एका क्लिकवर उघडण्यात मदत करते.
short.ru: Это расширение Chrome помогает вам открывать новые документы Google, таблицы, заметки Keep, слайды, формы, письма щелчком мыши.
short.sw: Kiendelezi hiki cha Chrome hukusaidia kufungua Hati mpya za Google, Majedwali ya Google, Mikutano, Barua pepe kwa mbofyo mmoja.
short.ta: புதிய Google Docs, Sheets, Keep notes, Slides, Forms, Emails போன்றவற்றை ஒரே கிளிக்கில் திறக்க இந்த Chrome நீட்டிப்பு உதவுகிறது.
short.te: ఈ Chrome పొడిగింపు ఒకే క్లిక్‌తో కొత్త Google డాక్స్, షీట్‌లు, కీప్ నోట్స్, స్లయిడ్‌లు, ఫారమ్‌లు, సమావేశాలు, మీకు సహాయపడుతుంది.
short.th: ส่วนขยาย Chrome นี้ช่วยให้คุณเปิด Google เอกสาร, ชีต, Keep Notes, สไลด์, ฟอร์ม, การประชุม, อีเมลใหม่ได้ด้วยคลิกเดียว
short.tr: Bu Chrome uzantısı, yeni Google Dokümanlarını, E-Tablolarını, Keep notlarını, Slaytlarını, tek tıklamayla açmanıza yardımcı olur.
short.vi: Tiện ích mở rộng Chrome này giúp bạn mở Google Tài liệu, Trang tính, Ghi chú, Biểu mẫu, Email mới chỉ bằng một cú nhấp chuột.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of quick and efficient writing with Google Docs Quick Write! Whether you’re a student, professional, or creative writer, this extension is designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your writing process directly within Google Docs.

Key Features:

• Instant Access: Open a new Google Docs document with a single click, perfect for capturing your thoughts and ideas quickly.
• Template Integration: Start with pre-designed templates for various writing needs, including essays, reports, meeting notes, and more.
• Quick Links: Access your recent documents and frequently used templates without leaving the page.
• Enhanced Formatting: Utilize a suite of formatting tools to customize your document to your liking, ensuring your content looks polished and professional.
• Seamless Integration: Enjoy a smooth, integrated experience with Google Docs, allowing you to focus on your writing without distractions.

How to Use:

1. Install the Extension: Add Google Docs Quick Write to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open a New Doc: Click the extension icon to instantly open a new Google Docs document.
3. Choose a Template: Select from a variety of templates to jumpstart your writing process.
4. Start Writing: Begin typing and enjoy the enhanced features and tools designed to make your writing experience more efficient.
